# VZVirtioEntropyDeviceConfiguration

**Class**

A source of entropy for the guest’s random number generator.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZVirtioEntropyDeviceConfiguration
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioEntropyDeviceConfiguration] object to expose a source of entropy for the guest operating system’s random-number generator. When you create this object and add it to your virtual machine’s configuration, the virtual machine configures a Virtio-compliant entropy device. The guest operating system uses this device as a seed to generate random numbers.

Create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioEntropyDeviceConfiguration] object and add it to the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration/entropyDevices] property of your virtual machine’s configuration.

## Creating the configuration object

- **init()**: Creates an entropy device configuration object.

## Configurations

- **VZEntropyDeviceConfiguration**: The common configuration traits for entropy devices.

## Inherits From

- VZEntropyDeviceConfiguration

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
